alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 12:37PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong cluster of thunderstorms will impact portions of central Delaware County through 115 PM EDT... At 1236 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong cluster of thunderstorms near Colchester, or near Walton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Walton, Delhi, Colchester, Meredith, Hamden, Andes, Meridale, Fishs Eddy, Harvard and Bovina Center. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 87A and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
